from:
(hrefify relpath) ++
  "\" />\n    <title>" ++
    domain ++
      " " ++
        feedtitle ++
          "</title>\n    <subtitle>" ++
            (has feedname |? (domainname ++ pageuri) |!
               (Str.trim $ Html.stripMarkup True ' ' feeddesc))
              ++
              "</subtitle>\n    <id>http://" ++
                domainname ++
                  pageuri ++
                    "</id>\n    <link href=\"http://" ++
                      domainname ++
                        pageuri ++
                          "\"/>\n    <updated>" ++ updated ++ "T00:00:00Z</updated>\n    "
